website_summaries.verdict: Uses bacteria and other ingredients in a safe supplement to remove toxins from the kidneys of cats of any age.
pros: Supports healthier kidney functions using a formula that's manufactured in the United States
Can be taken with other supplements without affecting how those supplements work
cons: More expensive than some other supplements
Uses a capsule, so some animals won't take it easily

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend this product strongly enough for cats with kidney disease. Refrigerate!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product strongly enough for cats who have been diagnosed with kidney problems. The caveat is that it must be refrigerated or it loses its effectiveness. My cat was 21 when she died. She was on Science Diet K/D and I found this product after the vet said that the subcutaneous fluids were not working any more. She lived several more years after that-- without subcutaneous fluids. I sprinkled it on her food. I did not have to use it continuously.
customer_reviews.author: mulberry

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately Shannon passed last July 24th from degenerative myelopathy, an nervous system disorder resembling multiple sclerosis in humans altogether different from kidney disease. However, she had been diagnosed with kidney disease in August 2015, and Azodyl was one of the products I used to stabilize her creatinine levels, in fact they dropping from 3.2 to 2.6. Azodyl, along with diet like green triple dog food, omega 3's, b vitamins and cranberries helped keep her healthier and happier and live a little longer, but sadly not as long as I would've wanted. Great product, highly recommended. Thank you Vetoquinol for Azodyl, keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Riverol

customer_reviews.title: Great product when shipped properly
customer_reviews.text: I've tried two times purchasing this product from you and each time it was shipped without ice packing which made the product useless. I had to order from another source. This product is live and must be kept refrigerated at all times. Each time I give you this review and nothing is said or done to correct this situation. I try to buy everything from you.
customer_reviews.author: the Mod

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cats life. He was diagnosed with beginning ...
customer_reviews.text: Saved my cats life. He was diagnosed with beginning stages of kidney failure in jan. 2014 and I was told he would have about 2 years left and to expect his kidney levels to worsen every year. Last year, when I took him in for his annual, the vet was surprised that his kidney levels had returned to normal. I also break the capsule and pour the powder into the wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfliesndolphins

customer_reviews.title: Improper shipping and difficult to administer
customer_reviews.text: Package was shipped in a cold pack. However the ice pack was not only melted but hot. I’m not sure if any of the benefits of a temperature sensitive formula still remains. The supplement has several instructions for administering which doesn’t work well for a 5 lb. chihuahua who won’t even open his mouth for a nice treat let alone swallow a capsule. Instructions say do not open capsule, feed 1 hour before main meal. My little guy eats when he is hungry. Meal times vary. So with all of that, after paying $70+, I will look for other options. This manufacturer should take into consideration there are plenty of small dogs around; Developing a formula to suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a CKD/PKD pet, you really need to give this a try.
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl has been a literal lifesaver for my cat. My vet has been consistently stunned with how good her bloodwork has been for the past year, a far cry from when she was originally given just 48 hours to live at diagnosis. Per his advice (which is in line with the manufacturer), I mix the contents of the capsule with fish oil and syringe it down. That way, the bacteria are protected from the stomach acid. Some reviews note that their bottle didn't arrive with a cold pack. Mine did, but it was thawed on arrival. The bottle, however, was still pretty cool to the touch, so I think it stayed cold enough to maintain efficacy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my cat alive longer
customer_reviews.text: This product is recommended for cats with CKD (Chronic kidney failure). After 3 Mos of giving to my cat, his BUN numbers went down a little! It's better than increasing everything three months like it was for 6 months! Highly recommending this product. I used a pill popper & my awesome kitty never minded the pill pop process!
customer_reviews.author: GSD_Lover_NY

customer_reviews.title: Refrigeration needed
customer_reviews.text: Medication bottle top had a sticker stating keep refrigerated at 4 degrees Celsius. My shipment arrived in a standard box with no cold packing. It is likely the medication degraded beyond use. This is a prescription needed for my dog so I have to have it but but will not try from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: FiveOf5

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this product.
customer_reviews.text: My cat has known kidney disease. I bought this product from our vet and it was about the same price but only lasted 1 month. After I started giving to my cat I noticed a big difference. A lot more energy, increased appetite and just back to his old self. The great thing about it is that you can open the capsule and empty the contents into the food. I would never be able to get him to swallow it. I know some reviews said not to break open but it has to be better than not giving it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Barboza

customer_reviews.title: They need a better way to ship this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit pricey; however, has keep my cat alive. She is coming up on 19 years and is still active and gained weight back since I have started this product. Cat also on a low/no protein diet. One drawback is that it comes wrapped in a cooler pack which has always been warm, wet and sticky. They need a better way to ship this product; however, the overall quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Burgert

customer_reviews.title: Azodyl really works
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. I have had three cats with renal disease. They ultimately succumbed to other conditions - not renal failure. Azodyl helped maintain Creatinine and BUN at manageable levels.
customer_reviews.author: John Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by my vet about 8 yrs ago
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my vet about 8 yrs ago. My cat is now 20 1/2 years old and his creation count has gotten better over the years. I do give him fluids weekly which help the kidneys too. He may be skinny now but he is a joy to be around and is obviously feeling pretty good at his rip old age.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Low

customer_reviews.title: Do not use
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl almost killed my beloved Bichon Lucy. I did not pay the expedited shipping and the product came at room temperature with ice packs that were not cold. She became very lethargic and would hardly eat or even move around, all she did was sleep. I was so afraid we would lose her. I spent $1200 at the vet doing tests on her and they found nothing life threatening. I took her off the Azodyl and she is back to her normal self after three days.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Pratt

customer_reviews.title: MONEY THROWN AWAY.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero rating I would. The product may be good BUT the Azodyl I received was warm, almost hot. This product is supposed to be kept cool at all times. I wrote to the company (VetInternetCo) and they essentially said "Too bad, there's nothing we can do." Such a waste of money. Amazon should NOT work with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than a year ago, my kitty was diagnosed ...
customer_reviews.text: More than a year ago, my kitty was diagnosed with renal failure and he was sent Azodyl in addition to special concentrate, since then he has been stable and asymptomatic. He is a 9-year-old cat, cheerful and active.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Angela

customer_reviews.title: Received HOT
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this was very effective. Gave my dog much cheaper chews with better results. Although the packaging looks substantial, two shipments have arrived hot to the touch instead of refrigerated. I doubt if I’ll even open the second shipment.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My 17 year old cat is so much better!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old cat is so much better! Three years ago she was diagnosed with kidney failure. She was drinking so much water, urinating large volumes and felt awful. Now, she back to her old self and we are only finishing our second bottle!!! I have to mix it with a small amount of food, because she doesn't take pills well. I wait an hour afterward before giving her a full meal. She doesn't tolerate dry food anymore. It is a bit expensive on my budget, but it is worth it. I use much less litter and she doesn't go outside her box anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for my cats kidney issues....
customer_reviews.text: I have used this now for two cats that had/have kidney failure issues. My one cat Kokomo got sick at age 14 and lived to be 20. My current best friend Phineas is 10. Both cats showed improvement when taking this supplement and being placed on kidney specific food. I highly reccomend. I know its expensive. But, when it comes to my pets....
customer_reviews.author: SarahG221

customer_reviews.title: This medication was wa m by the time it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: This medication was wa m by the time it arrived It must stay cold at all times It should have come in an insilated container with dry ice
customer_reviews.author: C G Roberts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for kidney failure dogs
customer_reviews.text: my dog was diagnosed with kidney failure.. I've been giving this to my dog for a month now mixed with NutraScience Renal essentials, changed diet and pepcid. AFter a month the vet called and his levels went back to normal - we are all so happy! i put it in some whipped cream - he eats them right up lol
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Auriemma

customer_reviews.title: Azodyl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as my dig has renal disease. However, the product was received hot. It was not cool as the use packs used did not keep the product cold. Therefore a better shipping method should be sought to maintain the integrity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this for my 11 lb kitty with kidney disease. Although the bottle says take two a day, the vet said my cat only needed one a day. I wish the capsules could be sprinkled on her food instead of forced down her throat. I literally have to turn her over and hold her in a football hold, pry her mouth open with my finger, get bitten while putting it in the back of her throat. She will then proceed to spit it out several times until she finally swallows it. This traumatizes her and now she runs from me any time I try approaching her for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY  Vetoquinol 425856 Azodyl small cap from " Authentic Wares"
customer_reviews.text: ORDER FROM AUTHENTIC WARES - "NO QUALITY GUARANNTEED" The package arrived today. The product didn't wrap with an icepack. It was warm. This product is supposed to be kept in a refrigerator at 4 degrees C. I definitely will not buy anything from " Authentic Wares" again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, POOR SHIPPING PRACTICE
customer_reviews.text: Actually, product works REALLY GREAT!! Our little "baby" was near death in January. This product has held her liver levels low and she is doing very well, 6 months later. Ok, why the low rating? I paid the extra fee for fast shipping as this product requires refrigeration. It was poorly packaged in a plastic envelope with a very thin ice sleeve. Of course, the product arrived 3 days later with the ice sleeve fully melted and the entire package registering over 90 degrees. I threw it away and bought from another company who shipped it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 yr. old Yorkshire Terrier. About 2 years ago, her kidneys started to fail. It was sudden. I noticed she had not touched her food for 2 days and took her to the vet. When I arrived, her tongue was dark and they told me her kidneys were failing. Like a miracle, she woke up the next day and was ready to go. I have to get this medication as well as Epakitin for her through Amazon because they dont have it 'back at home. For the past 2 years she has been living a normal life thanks to these medication and the food prescribed.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN I ORTIZ ONEILL

customer_reviews.title: Product is great BUT it must stay cold
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with cold pack open product was warm, I returned the product and have never received my refund! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nana2Nine

customer_reviews.title: Helps with kidney issues
customer_reviews.text: My cat Pandora was diagnosed with kidney failure last April. We are doing all we can to keep her healthy & this supplement has really helped. It is expensive but I see a lot more spring in her step & she's more active when she gets this in addition to daily fluids, phosphorus binder& Vitamin K.
customer_reviews.author: JCatz

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed, this product has to be refrigerated at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed, this product has to be refrigerated at all times and it was shipped without any kind of ice cold pack! I actually should have return but i needed asap. This should never happened!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA MATOS

customer_reviews.title: Azoldyl SAVED my kitty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about Azodyl. It literally saved my cat from kidney disease. I use it along with Epakitin and Renal K (all from Vetoquinol) and my kitty has perked right back up. Be sure to keep it refrigerated. It is best to give it whole. I use a pill gun device called the Bullseye Pill gun to easily administer the pills.
customer_reviews.author: jeannemeece

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is suppose to remain COLD /refrigerated.. The seller ships with one cold pack. Cold pack was warm and also the product.. I will NOT be using this product on my dog.. I have contacted the seller and no response.. I have put in for a return.. Better safe than sorry.. My vet gave a cold pack for a 10 mile travel from her office to my home.. That should tell everyone something about how this product is suppose to stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: KSK

customer_reviews.title: Perishable item not shipped properly
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl is a perishable medication that requires refrigeration. it should be shipped in an insulated package with dry ice, preferably with rush shipping. My shipment arrive in a standard box with a melted ice pack rubber banded to it. It is very possible the medication has degraded. As this is a prescription for my aging cat I will continue to buy it, but certainly not from this vender.
customer_reviews.author: cptvdo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lack of proper shipping of medication requiring coolent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product requires refrigeration m. It is a live probiotic medication. It arrived with 2 small cold packs about the size post card. One was leaking all over medication. I live in Texas, temp that day was 90+ degrees on my porch. When I opened Mylar bag, content was wet with coolent, I checked temp of inside, it was 88 degrees. Delivery was 2 days. I have ordered from another vendor, shipping was next day, styrofoam box with 3 quart coolent packs. Packs were still frozen, medication cold. Cost was $18 less. Talking to vendor was waste of time
customer_reviews.author: CaninePDL

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product that's shipped in a chilled package and well ...
customer_reviews.text: Our two senior dogs were diagnosed with kidney failure. Through a change of diet and a daily supplement of Azodyl, their kidney levels have been maintaining normal. It's a great product that's shipped in a chilled package and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: JR Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Good supplement for CKD but to work, it needs to stay cold. Fool me once, not again. I'll pay more elsewhere to ensure it arrives cold.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONJUNKIE

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: This medicine was $20 cheaper than at my veterinarian clinic. It was shipped, wrapped in a small blue ice sleeve and then wrapped in multiple insulated bags. This medicine is extending the life of my dog who has renal failure
customer_reviews.author: William Holtzinger

customer_reviews.title: not sure if works
customer_reviews.text: my cat has kidney failure, vet recommended trying this. hmm, his numbers have been up and down. he is drinking more water, #'s improved. so not sure if due to this product or him drinking more water. will keep trying though.
customer_reviews.author: g y

customer_reviews.title: Uncertain if this really works
customer_reviews.text: There's no peer reviewed studies on these particular strains of probiotics if they really help the kidneys. After trying these multiple times over a period of five years, we've not seen any improvements for our cats who have been living with advanced stage kidney disease for the past five years. I have difficult to rate these because anecdotal reviews are too biased to offer anyone enough info to consider purchasing these expensive supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Mine came piss warm . ice packs completely thawed like it had been in a 100 degree truck for days (which im sure it was ) don't skimp and try too save a few bucks it clearly states on the bottle too not let it get warm. The last seller I bought this from automatically 1 day shipped this one had a 7 day window though it came in 2
customer_reviews.author: sarah lynn provost

customer_reviews.title: Vet diagnosed my cat with CRF,
customer_reviews.text: Vet diagnosed my cat with CRF, but Ive been giving my cat one of these every day along with kd kidney care food and he has had normal levels for over a year
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best for your cat or dogs kidney values
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best for your cat or dogs kidney values. I give it my older cats everyday to keep their kidneys working well. I have a 19 year old cat who has has kidney failure for two years and is still with me and I truly believe it is the Azodyl that has helped him this far.
customer_reviews.author: pawz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These pills have helped my dog immensely since being prescribed by my veterinarian. This is the best price I found anywhere, and excellent delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Bobster

customer_reviews.title: My vet recommended this product as part of his support regimen
customer_reviews.text: My dog was diagnosed about two months ago with kidney disease. My vet recommended this product as part of his support regimen. I researched it and found no known side effects and I like that it's a supplement, not a drug. Within three weeks, my dog's kidney values were half what they were at initial diagnosis. Will continue Azodyl.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Fulleborn

customer_reviews.title: Bring your cat with kidney disease back from the brink
customer_reviews.text: After the vet said hydration was no longer working and I had had numerous emergency trips to the vet for bladder infections and to have the anal glands expressed, I looked on the internet and this product was recommended. I know it was probably the combined effect of k/d food, staying away from vaccines, and staying away from human food (with onions and garlic), and staying away from toxic house plants like dracaena and lilies, but my cat's kidney numbers are now one tenth of a point away from normal. Wish I had gotten her on this earlier. It is shipped with a freezer pack WHICH IS A MUST as this product is sensitive to heat.
customer_reviews.author: mulberry

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: My cat has kidney disease. Since giving him this supplement he has gained back the weight he lost. He vomits a lot less, less thirsty, less voiding.
customer_reviews.author: B. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great product... Very effective.
customer_reviews.text: Great product... It saved my dog's life.... The only thing that keeps here kidney problems under control. I just wish it was more easily available across more countries. It ships with a cold pack in an insulated thermacol box and the package was still cold... Converse with the seller about expiry dates if you are stocking up. They were very helpful. And let whoever is receiving the package on your behalf to refrigerate it as soon as it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: DU

customer_reviews.title: My cat was diagnosed with early kidney failure and experiencing ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat was diagnosed with early kidney failure and experiencing all the symptoms that come with it. After using Azodyl, he has stopped vomiting and is back to his usual self, following me around the house and yelling.
customer_reviews.author: xeana3001

customer_reviews.title: Helps Support Kidney Function
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product multiple times for my 21 year old cat. She is not one for pills, so I open the capsule, and mix it with a little bit of food and feed it to her an hour before her regular meal. She doesn't seem to notice at all. :)
customer_reviews.author: GotButterflies

customer_reviews.title: Easy work-around even if the capsule is too big for your pet
customer_reviews.text: This capsule is too big for my cat. However, it's really easy to split open the capsule and sprinkle it on my cat's food. Ironically, she seems to love the taste of the powder inside because she eats it up so fast! So of course it'd be more ideal if I I could feed the capsule to my cat whole, but being able to sprinkle it on her wet food and have her eat it up no problem has really been an easy work-around!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Not worthiy..
customer_reviews.text: Arrived hot was supposed to be a cold package.took weeks to arrive.ended up throwing it out....waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: cheryl moore

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Our fabulous cat, a 13 year old Maine Coon, has been taking this brand and style since he was diagnosed with kidney issues 3 years ago. His BUN has maintained a healthy level, still slightly in the upper end of normal, but nowhere near as high as before we started treatment. We usually break open the capsule and squish the powder into a pill pocket, which he eats without fussing. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl was recommended by my vet for my elderly (15-years-old) Norwegian Elkhound Trudi. Trudi's kidneys are not working as well as they used to but Azodyl has really helped and has lowered her ammonia level and other chemistries back to normal. We'll keep using it as long as Trudi hangs in there and is still enjoying life!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dlott

customer_reviews.title: She just had another renal blood work done and it's BETTER! Also
customer_reviews.text: This saved my 19 year old cat's life. She just had another renal blood work done and it's BETTER! Also, if your renal cat doesn't want to eat, use tummy troble or even better, slippery elm. I just use 4-5 drops and she hasn't thrown um in weeks (when she gorged on dry food). Get your renal cat to drink more water by putting a water dish fountain where they like to sleep or nap! This works wonders, she even rests her head on the thing and falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: H.R. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty is 17 years old and in the preliminary stages of CRF. I believe that by giving her Azodyl twice a day (we're lucky she'll take it) we've not only extended her time with us, but improved her time with us. Our vet gave her six months to live nearly two years ago and kitty is still playing, purring and enjoying her life.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl kept Trudi the Norwegian Elkhound alive and healthy until she was 16 years old. Not cheap but worth it. Don't forget to refrigerate the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dlott

customer_reviews.title: Arrived warm
customer_reviews.text: This medicine needs to stay cold. Each time it arrives its warm and all if the ice packs are melted. I'm ordering somewhere else that offers overnight delivery, and yes the meds get here ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in really bad condition.
customer_reviews.text: Seller shipped this product to me, which needed refrigeration, with very flimsy icepacks. The product was ruined as it was very HOT during that time. I certainly was not going to give it to my cat in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Carson

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed as recurved hot and needs to be refrigerated. Should use foam cooler. They did reimbursed me so it's just had me scrambling to find a bottle fast.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy D Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful supplement for the kidney compromised feline
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is helping my elderly kidney compromised cat with me. She made so much progress since I started this supplement. Then I transitioned her to a raw diet and she is doing so well! I will NEVER feed a cat commercial food again. Raw is the way to keep them healthy! They are obligate (required) carnivores! There is no such thing as a vegetarian feline! They need meat and they don't need grains!
customer_reviews.author: Trish87109Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: poor delivery technique
customer_reviews.text: pet medication is said to contain microbiotics and must be kept cold. out of 3 deliveries at no time was the medication cold. I won't order again
customer_reviews.author: Juno's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Just received the product and it is at room temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product and it is at room temperature! It's supposed to be kept refrigerated. Definitely buying elsewhere next time and will be requesting a refund from the vendor. I saw at least one other review about it not being cold. Should have heeded the review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery is slow, though, so be prepared
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a year or so now and it seems to be helping my cat. He has been living comfortably with kidney failure for about a year and 7 months now and I think this product helps him. But, because they deliver it with an ice pack - if you order a bunch of stuff all at once, you will get everything else a few days before you get this. So, just be sure and order before you run out.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee the Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Using this dropped the levels in my cat's kidney health report. It works. Package was done well. Wrapped in an ice pack and sealed in something else, I cant remember. But it stayed cool.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Does it work?
customer_reviews.text: I assume it works. I have seen no creditable evidence that it works as advertised other than by the by manufacturer, but my Vet prescribed it so we give it to our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: recommended by vet
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate flavor since it's for cats. This was recommended by the vet for my older cats (16 yrs old) and it was somewhat less expensive on line that at the vet. It's apparently a well renown product.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. BORREMANS

customer_reviews.title: Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl Works, My cat has been on it now for 9 months, and her Kidney numbers have gone from way out of whack to just slightly higher than normal. I know this isn't scientific, but I believe this stuff works. Getting Cat to swallow is pill is impossible, so instead, I've added it to her food every day.
customer_reviews.author: Surreal Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Good but very expensive product. I am sure there is something less expensive but most veterinarians advise their clients to buy this for their cats.
customer_reviews.author: Galina Yevseenko

customer_reviews.title: Supplement to maybe help Kidney failure
customer_reviews.text: Great Price as compared. Received cool (Azolyd needs refrigeration) as gel was on its last cooling legs. Next time I will order on Monday, so it doesn't sit in shipping over the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Motz

customer_reviews.title: Packaging/shipping great; function of medication unknown
customer_reviews.text: Been reading reviews that claim that this product has normalized their pets renal values. I have not found this to be so. But maybe it's helping to stabilize, as values are not climbing as they were at first. I have to open the capsule and sprinkle on food, my pet is having trouble taking oral meds right now. This seller packages the product in a refrigerator cooler to maintain temp of product. This is a probiotic combo and refrigeration is suggested to maintain quality. So extremely satisfied with that!! If this med brought down her values, 5 stars would be my rating - this is Why I'm giving 4; which is still a very good rating.
customer_reviews.author: David, central Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Azodyl extended my pet's life
customer_reviews.text: My persian cat was diagnosed with Renal failure approximately one year ago. That's right! One year ago and after giving my cat Azodyl every day it is extended his life, he is eating and moving around as he always did prior to the prognosis. I know he will not live forever but his quality of life is much better and he is not suffering. Excellent product if your pet, either dog or cat is diagnosed with renal failure. Give it a try and give your pet the chance for better quality of life. This company shipped this immediately, put it on dry ice and I had it in more than a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great CRF support
customer_reviews.text: Really helped my girl in chronic renal failure (CRF). She lived much longer than expected and was healthier for longer. Strongly recommend for use as soon as diagnosed with CRF.
customer_reviews.author: N Gossage

customer_reviews.title: is it wasted??
customer_reviews.text: received product in Hot condition, along with two packs of Gel, I don't whether to use it or throw it now spend 68$ app. is it wasted??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AZODYL is amazing. Ernest & Pedro from
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding. My pet who suffers from a kidneys that are functioning at 20%. He had lost so much weight until I started giving him Azodyl. He has made a full recovery. Even though his kidneys are at 20%, he has gained back the weight and his kidneys are kept as toxin-free as possible. AZODYL is amazing. Ernest & Pedro from Miami
customer_reviews.author: Pedro G.

customer_reviews.title: using azodyl
customer_reviews.text: Azodyl has helped my cat that has kidney disease. I use a 1.0 monoject oral syringe from our vet to administer. I use a syringe full of water, empty the capsule(powder) into the water, stir and pull it up into the syringe. Then place the syringe into the side of his mouth along his gum. This way does work and I don't give him the capsule whole and his blood work has been very good. Just make sure that the azodyl has been kept cold when it arrives and store it in your refrigerator. If anyone has any questions please just ask, I will try to help.
customer_reviews.author: lisa moskal

customer_reviews.title: ice cubes were not enough at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: So dissapointing to see the two little ice cubes- that actually did no good in terms of keeping the product cool/cold at all. Even on the cubes it say keeps cool for 20 min and they still shipped with that... I buy it often from another seller, i did assume it will be the same but it was not. Now i am not even sure if the product is still ok for my dog, have to consult with the vet before starting to use them.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Kidney support
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and the,company made an attempt to keep it refrigerated. However, when it arrived, the ice packets had thawed and were warm.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Ice pack melts to keep the Med cold. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Ice pack melts to keep the Med cold. This product is not worth a damn if it's gets warm. Buy it from the Vet. This med is expensive do not take a chance to save a few bucks
customer_reviews.author: Louisville Lip

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My vet did not recommend this to me for my cat, Georgie. I recommended it to her after online research prompted me to try it. The Azodyl, together with subdural irrigation, and Spot's Stew, which is low in protein but apparently delicious, has really improved Georgie's health and my happiness level. I highly recommend this trio of treatments! By the way, after seeing the latest blood work on Georgie, my vet now suggests it for cats and dogs with kidney problems.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murray

customer_reviews.title: SAVING MY DOG'S LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The vet gave my 2-and-a-half-year-old dog with renal failure a few days to a few weeks to live. He suggested that we take her home to say good bye and then bring her back to have her put to sleep. I began researching canine kidney disease and came across Azodyl. I am giving her many supplements for her ailment, make her food using eggs as the source of protein since they are easier on the kidneys, and give her daily subcutaneous fluids by IV; however, I believe that Azodyl is a key ingredient to her not vomiting continuously anymore, regaining her energy, and staying strong over the past 5 MONTHS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Man of Truth

customer_reviews.title: This helped my cat
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for an old cat in Stage 4 kidney failure. Gave the old cat back his appetite right away, with no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Aldne Now

customer_reviews.title: Azodyl caps 60ct from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first ordered Axzodyl from Amazon. I wanted to save money because my cat will need this product for the rest of her life. It is much less expensive when I order it from Amazon. I worried about the fact that it had to be kept refrigerated. This product is supposed to prolong a cat's life if they are in renal failure. My cat seems to be doing well. Well, first of all, it arrived in 4 days from the day I ordered it. It was packed in an insulated beg and had two entirely frozen ice packs inside. I am very happy with the price and the service!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Loftin

customer_reviews.title: An Established, Proven Product
customer_reviews.text: A phenomenal product to assist a cat's kidney function. The small capsules can be inserted with a pill popper w/o undo difficulty, depending of course on how extreme of a cat you have. Veterinarian-recommended. No prescription required.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Nice job
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog has a mild kidney problem and these pills are seeming to help. I'm not sure how you managed to keep these pills cold for four days but they were cold when they arrived. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Only issue is this medication is supposed to be keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is this medication is supposed to be keep cold.. even after writing to entirely pet.. i revieved it room temp.. the 1st time i ordered it straight from the manufacturer & it was ice cold when it arrived. I expect the same from this other company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep them on this if you can afford it. It does help immensely.
customer_reviews.text: Helped my cat a lot with Chronic Renal Failure. If your cat is experiencing it, this stuff will absolutely make his life a lot better. He was with us for a very long time and I do credit this to keeping his numbers down and keeping him happy and playful. Knowing this exist makes me feel a bit more comfortable when fostering other senior cats in the near future, since renal failure is a very common occurrence in older cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Product great. Shipping and handling, not so much!
customer_reviews.text: This product is used for my dog in renal failure and I have used it before with much success. When the package came, it wasn't listed anywhere on the outside that it contained a product that needed refrigeration and to open immediately. This should have been there.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ralabate

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Cat has ckd, using this product and giving fluids the vet says has really slowed the progression, and the blood work looks real good
customer_reviews.author: DKDIRT63

customer_reviews.title: Tried for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I think it is helping my cat who has chronic kidney disease. He seems to eat better on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price but Ice packs are melted.
customer_reviews.text: I give Azodyl to my dog on the recommendation of his Vet. Good product at a great price. Needs refrigeration. Comes double packed but Ice packs are melted and at room temperature upon arrival. Seller informed me that Black Ice packs are gel packs. I submitted a review previously but only mentioned the ice packs nothing about the good product and value.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: ... a really expensive supplement that did nothing for my poor baby, Shitz Shu
customer_reviews.text: Just a really expensive supplement that did nothing for my poor baby, S***z Shu. Was considering switching to just a good probiodic from Mercola.com that did not need refrigeration instead but my little angel had passed away.
customer_reviews.author: JADE

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Refrigeration for this in shipment doesn’t last as long as it should. Other than that happy with the quality, shipment duration, packaging, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Shlease

customer_reviews.title: Hope this works...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Cattyvet for my mom's cat with polycystic kidney disease. It's supposed to be refrigerated, but it arrived regular mail (not Priority) with no dry ice or cold pack. The directions say to refrigerate at 4 degrees Celsius, which is 39 degrees Fahrenheit. So I don't know if it is still effective now. She has had a problem getting the cat to swallow the capsules twice a day - he hates taking them. The capsules are small, but have to be swallowed whole to work. They can't be hidden in food where they might be chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very delicate to the temperature and has to be delivered in a special icebox. I received in a regular mail envelope with a pack of melted ice!It was an emergency for my cat and I could not return - I used. The second time I ordered from another seller more expensive, but it came packed like from Swiss Bank -:)Before you buy, ask a seller about packing!Otherwise, you pay for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: LID

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my cat alive for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my older cat for years. I started him at the age of 16 and now at 19 he is still going strong. His creatine count was 3.7 at the beginning and last blood test it was 3.2. Vet was amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Low

customer_reviews.title: It is best to watch mail box
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. NOTE: It is best to watch mail box. The 3 times I have ordered this product it has shipped sooner than indicated when order was placed, and this product must stay cold to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dogs with kidney problems
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our little old dogs who are having kidney troubles... it seems to keep their kidney values in check and allows them to feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: George Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Vet tried this on my elderly cat and it helped her kidney health
customer_reviews.author: Kay Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Your Pet Will Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Our aging Jack Russell dog has needed to take the supplement Azodyl for a number of years now. Previously, we bought the capsules from our veterinarian who charged twice what we are able to get them for here. We were worried about the product maintaining its freshness in transport as I has to be kept refrigerated. No worries - our three-month supply arrives fresh in a cool-pak. It is the same product our vet charges double for and arrives quickly and conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: Newsman49

customer_reviews.title: Refrigeration at 4 degrees Centigrade?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived. Cold-pack surrounding the product was warm; fluid inside it-melted.
customer_reviews.author: count 456

customer_reviews.title: Azodyl
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue dog that had rotted teeth(now removed) and the infection had damaged her kidneys to the point that the vet gave her 6 - 12 months. She was already on prescription medication, but it had not improved her status. She had stopped eating and was on appetite stimulants. I went on line searching for any kind of help, found Azodyl. Kirstie is now 9 months later, eating so much, with out the stimulants, that I have had to put her on a diet, full of life and energy! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wants review for a 2nd time but product hasn't been delivered!
customer_reviews.text: Have no idea if I like the product, because it hasn't been delivered as of the time of the review. It is scheduled to be delivered today but is also several days late in being delivered. I'll consult with the cat several days after he starts taking it to find out if its beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: addonii

product_meta.title: Vetoquinol Azodyl Kidney Health Supplement for Dogs & Cats, 90ct - Probiotic Pet Well-being - Help Support Kidney Function & Manage Renal Toxins - Renal Care Supplement - Easy-to-Swallow Small Caps
feature_bullets: Azodyl probiotic caps to help support kidney function; safe for cats & dogs of all ages and sizes
Contains beneficial bacteria to help promote good kidney health & manage uremic (renal) toxins
Azodyl for Dogs and Cats is suitable for pets of all sizes who need extra kidney health support
Special formula of three naturally-occurring, friendly bacteria (probiotics) for happy pet well-being
Trusted US supplement brand with NASC Quality Seal, devoted to animal health since 1933
